entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2001/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E76: TÁRKI Omnibus 2001/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Róbert, Péter
2. Tóth, István György
2. Tóth, Zsolt
3. Szivós, Péter
4. Molnár, Jenő
5. Józan, Anna
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Land Credit and Mortgage Bank Inc. (3.)
entry.dcterms:description: 1) party preferences, popularity of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, subjective financial situation, evaluating the economic situation of Hungary 2) media consumption habits, evaluation of news, opinions about the unemployment rate, opinions about the economic attitudes of parties, opinions about foreign capital investing in Hungary, subjective feeling of security, opinions about the work of the police and the death penalty 3) intentions to build, buy, renovate or extend a flat, applying for bankloan for housing purposes, criteria for selecting the bank which gives the loan 4) workplace harms, knowledge about work protection, health damaging factors 5) furniture purchase
entry.dcterms:subject: political institutions, public administration
mass media
economic conditions and indicators
law enforcement
working conditions
conflict, security and peace
housing
mass political behavior, attitudes
labour and employment
law, crime and legal systems
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
block 1: A, block 2: A, block 3: A, block 4: C, block 5: A
